title: Assured Space and Phantom Space seek to disrupt data-backhaul business
summary: Assured Space Access announced a strategic partnership with Phantom Space to establish Phantom Cloud, a data-backhaul service for satellites.

title: NASA selects seven companies for MSR studies
summary: NASA has selected seven companies to conduct studies of “out of the box” concepts for the agency’s Mars Sample Return (MSR) program that can deliver samples faster and cheaper than current plans.
